hover.crystals: Concentrated crystal energy; seems to radiate weak effects related with the associated element. Fragile and not easily moved.
hover.pylon: A powerful emitter of crystal energy. You are likely to need these later on.
hover.rune: Runes seem to be able to act as weak foci for crystal energy of their color.
hover.ore0: Seams of energy run through this rock; its contents are likely useful in your endeavours.
hover.ore1: Embedded in the stone appears to be a different kind of rock, one which glows with energy.
hover.ore2: Glowing an angry red, this rock may well have the capability to act as a lens for crystal energy.
hover.ore3: Fossilized crystals, fused together. Their color long since gone, they no longer contain energy but may be a good substrate.
hover.plant0: This gently glowing flower seems to weakly radiate energy; if extracted, its contents likely are crucial in maintaining an aura.
hover.plant1: Sparkling in the dark, there is something cleansing about the essence of this plant.
hover.plant2: This lily throbs will all colors of energy; perhaps its extracts could be used as a sort of unifier.
hover.plant3: This bush gives off a powerful aura - no doubt it will be critical in constructing beacons of your own.
hover.plant4: Hanging from the underside of leaves, these bulbs are filled with a magical dust of unknown nature.
hover.rainbowleaf: Never before have you seen a tree like this. With leaves of every color of the rainbow, there must be more to this tree than meets the eye.
